an3.103:1: "Bhikkhus, before my enlightenment, while I was just a bodhisatta, not yet fully enlightened, it occurred to me: () ‘What is the gratification in the world? (2) What is the danger in it? (3) What is the escape from it?’[n.567] In SN, this "template" and the two to follow are applied separately to the four elements (SN4.3–33, II 69–73), the five aggregates (SN22.26–28, III 27–3), and the six sense bases (SN35.3–8, IV 6–3).
